Detailed Description

DKJSONServiceProxy

Adds some syntatic sugar to interacting with a JSON-RPC Service 

    id _fromJSONResponse(id result) { // result will be an NSDictionary or NSArray
      // do some stuff
      return nil;
    }
    id _fromJSONResponseError(id result) { 
      // result will be an NSError(userInfo={error:NSDictionary(jsonRPCError)})
      NSLog(@"JSON Service Error: %@", [[result userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"]);
      // do some stuff
      return nil;
    }
    id service = [DKDeferred jsonService:@"http://url.net/j" name:@""];
    [[[service someNamespace] someMethod:array_(arg1, arg2)]
     addCallbacks:callbackP(_fromJSONResponse) :callbackP(_fromJSONResponseError)];

Definition at line 56 of file DKDeferred+JSON.h.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) : (NSArray *)  args  

Executes a JSON-RPC call on the server. Returns a deferred which will callback with the native representation of the method results.

- (id) initWithURL: (NSString *)  url  

Returns an initialized DKJSONServiceProxy which will direct method calls to url

Definition at line 66 of file DKDeferred+JSON.m.

- (id) initWithURL: (NSString *)  aUrl
serviceName: (NSString *)  aService 

Returns an initialized DKJSONServiceProxy which will direct method calls to url with the method preconfigred to serviceName.
